name: DarkWay
description:
The second game from Badgai Labs, DarkWay is set in a long dark hallway filled with enemies made of clay with gameplay like a shooter, but with a flashlight instead of a gun.

Mouse and keyboard only.

  • Left - A
  • Right - D
  • Aim with mouse
  • Right-Click - Short, wide beam (less powerful, but less drain on the battery, provides more ambient light)
  • Right-Click - Long, narrow beam (more powerful, more battery drain)

This is a very dark game.  For best results, play in the dark.
